backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining data types and state for authorization, storage, glossary, articles, research papers, learning content, feedback, market data, and blogs.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping performance-related features to source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of concise summaries for key frontend files including routing, hooks, components, and pages.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_RETRY.md: Documentation describing the staged deployment retry workflow with build, canister, and asset verification steps.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme definitions setting OKLCH color variables, dark mode overrides, and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining fonts, favicons, base metadata, and mounting point for the React app.
frontend/scripts/README.md: Readme describing deployment helper scripts for building and deploying the application.
frontend/scripts/retry-build-and-deploy-: Bash script automating build and deployment stages with detailed logging, error handling, and colored output.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the main React app with routing, theming, query client configuration, maintenance mode handling, and lazy-loaded pages.
frontend/src/components/AsyncChatAssista: Lazily loads the chat assistant widget after idle time or delay, rendering it only once loading is triggered.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Displays the brand logo with error handling and a text fallback when the image fails to load.
frontend/src/components/calculators/Cash: Renders a cash flow table with optional running balance and CSV export, with an empty state when no rows exist.
frontend/src/components/calculators/Resu: Empty placeholder file for a future bar chart component.
Creates an SVG donut chart showing invested vs earned amounts with a fallback for missing data.
frontend/src/components/ChatAssistantWid: Implements an interactive chat UI with intent detection, backend calls, disclaimers, and message handling.
frontend/src/components/domain/CustomDom: Empty placeholder for a custom domain FAQ component.
Empty placeholder for a custom domain setup guide component.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the footer with a live or closing NIFTY 50 stock ticker and feedback/navigation utilities.
frontend/src/components/GlossaryBackupRe: Allows exporting, validating, and restoring glossary snapshots with merge or replace options.
frontend/src/components/GlossaryBulkImpo: Provides a UI to confirm and publish a predefined batch of C‑letter glossary terms.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Navigation header with theme toggle, auth handling, and mobile menu, including calculator and admin links.
frontend/src/components/MaintenanceScree: Displays a full-page maintenance message with branding and icon.
frontend/src/components/RouteLoadingFall: Simple centered loading spinner used as a route-level fallback.
frontend/src/data/glossaryBulkImportC.ts: Exports a batch of static glossary definitions for C‑terms used for bulk backend import.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing on identity changes and invalidating related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing identity loading, login, logout, and status states. Includes helper functions to create AuthClient with custom options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for backend interactions, including maintenance checks, admin checks, user profiles, chat, glossary data, and other domain-specific queries. Integrates actor-based API calls with caching, error handling, and UI toasts.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with extensive theme tokens for light and dark modes, defining colors, radii, and component styling variables. Centralizes design system values for consistent theming across the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App. Loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with mission, vision, and philosophy sections using styled cards and icons. Focuses on describing the platform's purpose and educational approach.
frontend/src/pages/ArticlesPage.tsx: Displays categorized financial articles using tabbed navigation and React Query data fetching. Renders article previews with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/AtalPensionYojanaCalc: Provides an APY calculator that computes required monthly contributions based on user age and desired pension. Includes UI form inputs, validation, and formatted results.
frontend/src/pages/BlogDetailPage.tsx: Displays a single blog post with metadata, tags, formatted dates, and handles loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/BlogsPage.tsx: Lists all blog posts with previews, categories, tags, and navigation to individual blog detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/CAGRCalculatorPage.ts: Provides a form-based CAGR calculator with inputs for values and years, showing computed growth results.
frontend/src/pages/CalculatorsPage.tsx: Shows categorized navigation cards for various financial calculators with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders a contact form submitting feedback via an API and displays email and Instagram contact options.
frontend/src/pages/DisclaimerPage.tsx: Displays legal disclaimers, investment risk warnings, and clarifies the educational nature of the platform.
frontend/src/pages/DomainNamePage.tsx: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/EMICalculatorPage.tsx: A React page that calculates EMI, total interest, and repayment based on loan amount, interest rate, and tenure with formatted results.
frontend/src/pages/EPFCalculatorPage.tsx: A calculator page that computes EPF contributions, interest accumulation, and maturity balance using salary and contribution inputs.
frontend/src/pages/FDCalculatorPage.tsx: A fixed-deposit calculator that supports simple and compound interest to compute maturity amount and interest earned.
frontend/src/pages/FeedbackAdminPage.tsx: An admin page that authenticates users, checks admin rights, and displays searchable, sortable feedback with storage usage info.
frontend/src/pages/FixedVsReducingLoanCa: A calculator comparing fixed-rate and reducing-balance loan interest and repayment totals, showing the difference between methods.
frontend/src/pages/GlossaryPage.tsx: Implements searchable, grouped glossary with admin diagnostics, term parsing, and reference navigation.
frontend/src/pages/GratuityCalculatorPag: Calculates gratuity based on last salary and years of service using the statutory formula and shows eligibility status.
frontend/src/pages/GSTCalculatorPage.tsx: Provides a UI to input amount and GST rate, computes CGST/SGST split and total payable, and displays formatted results.
frontend/src/pages/HomeLoanEMICalculator: Calculates EMI, total interest, and total repayment for a home loan using principal, interest rate, and tenure inputs.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero banner, navigation buttons, and overview cards introducing the platform’s finance learning tools.
frontend/src/pages/HRACalculatorPage.tsx: Computes HRA exemption and taxable amount from salary, rent, and city type, displaying results with formatted values.
frontend/src/pages/LearningPage.tsx: Displays finance learning sections with topic matching, auto‑scrolling, and topic selection indicators using fetched content.
frontend/src/pages/LumpSumCalculatorPage: Provides a lump‑sum investment calculator using compound interest and displays results with charts and cash‑flow breakdown.
frontend/src/pages/NPSCalculatorPage.tsx: Calculates NPS retirement corpus, annuity amount, and monthly pension based on user inputs.
frontend/src/pages/NSCCalculatorPage.tsx: Computes NSC maturity value and interest earned using compound interest for fixed‑tenure investments.
frontend/src/pages/PPFCalculatorPage.tsx: A PPF calculator page that computes maturity, invested amount, and interest based on yearly contributions, tenure, and rate, and displays results with a pie chart.
frontend/src/pages/RDCalculatorPage.tsx: An RD calculator page that calculates maturity value, total deposits, and interest for recurring deposits using monthly contributions and displays formatted results.
frontend/src/pages/RegulationsPage.tsx: A static informational page outlining SEBI and RBI guidelines, investor protection details, and fraud awareness using tabbed content and alerts.
frontend/src/pages/ResearchPapersPage.ts: Fetches and displays research papers with loading states and allows users to download PDFs for each paper.
frontend/src/pages/SimpleInterestCalcula: Implements a simple interest calculator that computes interest and total amount based on principal, rate, and time.
frontend/src/pages/SimpleVsCompoundInter: Calculates and compares simple and compound interest using principal, rate, time, and compounding frequency.
frontend/src/pages/SIPCalculatorPage.tsx: A SIP calculator that computes future value, invested amount, and returns, and generates a cash flow schedule for monthly contributions.
frontend/src/pages/SSYCalculatorPage.tsx: An SSY calculator that computes maturity value, deposit years, and returns based on yearly investment, girl’s age, and SSY rules.
Offers step‑up SIP calculators using fixed-amount or percentage increases, computing total value, invested amount, and returns.
frontend/src/pages/SWPCalculatorPage.tsx: Provides a SWP calculator with inputs for investment, withdrawal, return rate, and duration, computing month‑wise withdrawals and final balance.
frontend/src/pages/XIRRCalculatorPage.ts: Builds an XIRR calculator allowing dynamic cash flow entries and estimating IRR via Newton‑Raphson.
frontend/src/utils/arthSaathiChat.ts: Provides language, intent, and calculator detection plus predefined refusal messages for the ArthSaathi chat assistant.
frontend/src/utils/assetPaths.ts: Generates base‑path‑aware asset URLs and centralizes static asset paths and brand metadata.
frontend/src/utils/cashFlowSchedules.ts: Utilities for generating cash‑flow labels, running balances, and contribution schedules for calculators.
frontend/src/utils/csv.ts: Implements CSV field escaping, array‑to‑CSV conversion, and client‑side CSV download.
frontend/src/utils/feedbackForm.ts: Stores the Google feedback form URL and provides helpers to open or embed it.
frontend/src/utils/formatters.ts: Contains number, currency, percentage, and byte‑size formatting utilities using Indian conventions.
frontend/src/utils/glossaryFormatting.ts: Parses glossary definitions, extracts references, normalizes term names, and groups terms for display.
frontend/src/utils/glossaryKey.ts: Normalizes glossary terms into deterministic keys for deduplication and backend compatibility.
frontend/src/utils/learningTopics.ts: Defines learning topic metadata and provides lookup and matching helpers by slug or section title.
frontend/src/utils/navStructure.ts: Defines the grouped navigation structure for the app including routes and subitems.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom fonts, extended color palette, container settings, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, existing optimization features, known issues, and pending feature requests related to performance improvements.
